algorithm_technique: Iterate from right to left, maintaining the maximum element seen so far.
problem_summary_simple: Replace each array element with the greatest element to its right, and the last element with -1.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate array in reverse, tracking max element to the right to replace current element.
key_insights: Processing the array from right to left is crucial for efficiency.
A single pass is sufficient by keeping track of the maximum element encountered so far.
The last element is a base case, always replaced by -1.
